name: NapSimulator
description:
Goal : Survive until the end of the class !

Manage your napping times while the teacher is not too close. If you're asleep when he's nearby, you lose ! But beware of sleep deprivation : if you don't have enough energy, you'll fall asleep for a certain time...

Controls : Webcam only (hide to close your eyes)

Our team :
Art by Sara Jaafar
Sound by Yannis Moulay
Programming by me
